notes: Meeting/seeing off; Guangzhou airport ↔ hotel (one direction). Prices mentioned: $55, $75, $105 (varies by hotel city and vehicle type).
Full-time translators with knowledge of language and furniture market. Price: $65.
Route: Hotel ↔ Furniture Center. Prices: $85 (passenger car), $125 (minivan). Other routes/business-class discussed on site.
Production control, warehouse visits, acceptance vs spec, packing list, logistics/consolidation. Price: 5% of purchase amount.
Open factory packaging for visual inspection; photo report. Price: $30/m3 within Foshan city.
Delivery from suppliers to consolidation warehouse when suppliers don’t deliver free. Price: $15/m3, but not less than $45 per batch.
Loading heavy/large cargo. Price: $20 per place.
Container ordering/submission for loading; EXW→FOB export; documents (certificates etc.); port handling; bill of lading/telex release; port/customs fees. Price: $1100 per container.
